name: re:colonize
description:
Description

This project was finished in just seven days. As a part of the Brackeys 2023.1 Game Jam. The theme for this competition was "An End Is a New Beginning."

In this game, you play as an engineer trying to help the surviving population rebuild their homes in a post-apocalyptic future. Each level presents a new challenge and puzzle to be solved, and you must carefully plan and execute the demolition of old buildings to make way for new construction to take their place.

The game is the perfect mix for city-building and puzzle game fans with its retro-inspired graphics and challenging gameplay. So why not try it and see if you can help rebuild a brighter future for the citizens of this post-apocalyptic world by solving some puzzles? Good luck, and have fun!

Credits

By Linus Vallinder
